p.i: The House met at Eleven o'Clock

speech.p: [Mr. SPEAKER in the Chair]
Will Members desirous of taking and subscribing the Oath please come to the Table? Members who are sitting above the Gangway, on both sides of the House, will come first.

p.i: The following Members took and subscribed the Oath, or made and subscribed the Affirmation required by Law:

speech.p: Evelyn Nigel Chetwode Birch, esquire, West Flint.
William Traven Aitken, esquire, Bury St. Edmunds.
Francis George Bowles, esquire, Nuneaton.
Aubrey Jones, esquire, Birmingham, Hall Green.

Resolved, "That this House do now adjourn till Tuesday next, 6th November, at 11 o'clock."—[Mr. Crookshank.]
Adjourned accordingly at Twenty-three Minutes to Three o'Clock.
